thmuggleton.model.impl

Class AbstractFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • thmuggleton.model.impl.AbstractFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Frame
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrameImpl, LastFrameImpl

    public abstract class AbstractFrame
extends Object
implements Frame
    Provides an implementation of shared functionality in regular frames and the last frame.
    Author:
    Thomas Muggleton

      • addBonusPoints

        protected abstract void addBonusPoints(int score)
        Adds bonus points for the frame. This method can be called more than once to accumulate bonus points in the case of a strike.
        Parameters:
        score -
        Throws:
        ScoreException - if frame was not a strike or a spare.
